title: Submission of Regulations imposed under the Regulation of Fertilizer Act, No.68 of 1988 for approval of Parliament
decision_details: - The fees payable for obtaining a license to import, manufacture or formulate fertilizer under the Regulation of Fertilizer Act, No.68 of 1988 have been published through the Regulations published in the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 1683/5 dated 2010 12 06. The approval has been granted at the Cabinet meeting held on 2024 02 05 to periodically revise the fees published by the said Regulations. Accordingly, the Regulations prepared by the Legal Draftsman, have been published in the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No. 2398/13 dated 2024 08 20. The proposal made by the Minister of Agriculture, Livestock, Lands and Irrigation to submit the said Regulations to Parliament for approval in accordance with the provisions of the Regulation of Fertilizer Act, No. 68 of 1988, was approved by the Cabinet.
